subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Islanders made several deals at the N.H.L.’s trade deadline, most notably acquiring Buffalo goaltender Michal Neuvirth to back up Jaroslav Halak.
snippet: The Islanders made several deals at the N.H.L.’s trade deadline, most notably acquiring Buffalo goaltender Michal Neuvirth to back up Jaroslav Halak.
